datasheets.Celestian_Sacresants.abilitie: While an ADEPTA SORORITAS CHARACTER is leading this unit, each time an attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.
datasheets.Celestian_Sacresants.fluff: Part of the Celestian elite of the Orders Militant, Celestian Sacresants are close-combat specialists - rather than bodyguards - charged with a holy quest. Whether securing sacred relics or purging sites of the unclean, the Sacresants are relentless in their pursuit of victory.
datasheets.Celestian_Sacresants.loadout: Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; hallowed mace.
Any number of models can each have their hallowed mace replaced with 1 anointed halberd.
The Sacresant Superior’s bolt pistol can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 inferno pistol ◦ 1 Ministorum hand flamer ◦ 1 plasma pistol
The Sacresant Superior’s hallowed mace can be replaced with 1 spear of the faithful.
Each time a model in this unit is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 2+, do not remove it from play; that destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
The bearer has a Move characteristic of 7" and a Save characteristic of 3+.
datasheets.Mortifiers.fluff: The pilot of a Mortifier is a Sister Repentia who has fled from battle. Bolted within the Mortifier’s armoured shell, they cannot move, speak or hear. Suffering endless shame and agony, they are driven by madness and pain to carve a path of mutilation and destruction through the foe.
datasheets.Mortifiers.loadout: Every model is equipped with: 2 heavy bolters; twin penitent buzz-blades.
datasheets.Mortifiers.wargear.0: Any number of models can each have their twin penitent buzz-blades replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 twin penitent flails ◦ 1 penitent buzz-blade and 1 penitent flail
datasheets.Mortifiers.wargear.1: Any number of models can each have their 2 heavy bolters replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 heavy bolter and 1 Mortifier flamer ◦ 2 Mortifier flamers
datasheets.Mortifiers.wargear.2: 1 model can be equipped with 1 anchorite sarcophagus.
datasheets.Canoness_with_Jump_Pack.abili: Once per battle round, one unit from your army with this ability can use it when it is targeted with a Stratagem. If it does, reduce the CP cost of that usage of that Stratagem by 1CP.

Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by this model and those weapons have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
datasheets.Canoness_with_Jump_Pack.fluff: Many Canonesses go to battle equipped with jump packs, using them to descend from the heavens and mete out the Emperor’s justice. They are the greatest and most experienced warriors of their Orders, combining strategic expertise with martial prowess. They lead flights of airborne warriors into the raging heart of the battle.
datasheets.Canoness_with_Jump_Pack.leade: This unit can be attached to the following units: ■ SERAPHIM SQUAD ■ ZEPHYRIM SQUAD
datasheets.Canoness_with_Jump_Pack.loado: This model is equipped with: blessed halberd.
datasheets.Canoness_with_Jump_Pack.name: Canoness with Jump Pack
datasheets.Canoness_with_Jump_Pack.warge: This model’s blessed halberd can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 holy eviscerator ◦ 1 Ministorum hand flamer and 1 power weapon
datasheets.Palatine.abilities.other.0.de: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.
datasheets.Palatine.abilities.other.1.de: Each time this model’s unit is selected to fight, you can discard 1 Miracle dice. If you do, until the end of the phase, each time a melee attack made by this model scores a wound, the target of that attack suffers 1 mortal wound in addition to any normal damage.
datasheets.Palatine.fluff: Palatines are highly capable and experienced commanders of Adepta Sororitas Missions. Unshakeable of faith and purpose, they are exemplars of the Imperial Creed. Their powerful belief inspires the zealous warriors they lead to victory.
datasheets.Palatine.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD ■ CELESTIAN SACRESANTS ■ DOMINION SQUAD ■ RETRIBUTOR SQUAD ■ SISTERS NOVITIATE SQUAD
datasheets.Palatine.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; Palatine blade.
datasheets.Palatine.wargear.0: This model’s bolt pistol can be replaced with 1 plasma pistol.
datasheets.Sanctifiers.abilities.other.0: While this unit contains a MINISTORUM PRIEST, melee weapons equipped by models in this unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.
datasheets.Sanctifiers.abilities.other.1:
Once per battle, after this unit has performed an Act of Faith, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

Designer’s Note: Place a Cherub token next to the unit, removing it once this ability has been used.
datasheets.Sanctifiers.abilities.special: If a MINISTORUM PRIEST from your army with the Leader ability can be attached to a BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD, it can be attached to this unit instead. If a MINISTORUM PRIEST from your army is attached to this unit during the Declare Battle Formations step, that model gains the Scouts 6" ability.
datasheets.Sanctifiers.abilities.wargear: In your Command phase, if the bearer is on the battlefield, you can return up to D3 destroyed models (excluding CHARACTER models) to this unit.

At the end of your Command phase, for each objective marker you control that has one or more units from your army with this ability within range of it, roll one D6: on a 4+, you gain 1 Miracle dice showing a value equal to that result.

The Salvationist is equipped with: close combat weapon; Salvationist medikit.

1 Missionary is equipped with: Ministorum flamer; Sanctifier melee weapon.
Every Sanctifier is equipped with: Ministorum hand flamer; Sanctifier melee weapon.
datasheets.Sanctifiers.rangedWeapons.0.a: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

datasheets.Arco_flagellants.abilities.ot: Each time this unit is selected to fight, you can choose to invoke its extremis trigger word. If you do, until the end of the phase, arco-flails equipped by models in this unit have an Attacks characteristic of 6 and the [HAZARDOUS] ability.
datasheets.Arco_flagellants.fluff: Arco-flagellants are fitted with cybernetic weaponry and subdermal stimulant pumps as punishment for past misdeeds. When battle commences, trigger words energise their bodies and the Arco-flagellants launch on the enemy. They lash any foe they reach to pieces with cyber-implanted flails.
datasheets.Arco_flagellants.loadout: Every model is equipped with: arco-flails.
datasheets.Imagifier.abilities.other.0.d: Each time you gain a Miracle dice as the result of an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit or model from your army being destroyed, if that unit or model was destroyed within 12" of this model, you can re-roll the result of that Miracle dice before adding it to your Miracle Dice pool.
datasheets.Imagifier.abilities.other.1.d: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a Save characteristic of 2+ and a 4+ invulnerable save.
datasheets.Imagifier.fluff: It is the most sacred role of the Imagifier to extol the virtues of fallen Sisters and preach tales of their saintly deeds. Imagifiers bear aloft great stanchions in the image of a martyr inscribed with holy texts and go wherever the fighting is thickest to recite litanies and inspire their fellow Sisters.
datasheets.Imagifier.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD ■ CELESTIAN SACRESANTS ■ DOMINION SQUAD ■ RETRIBUTOR SQUAD This model can be attached to a BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD, even if one CANONESS, PALATINE, JUNITH ERUITA or AESTRED THURGA unit has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.
datasheets.Imagifier.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Imagifier.leads.extra: This model can be attached to a BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD, even if one CANONESS, PALATINE, JUNITH ERUITA or AESTRED THURGA unit has already been attached to it. datasheets.Triumph_of_Saint_Katherine.ab: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, the Attacks characteristics of all of its weapons are halved, and you can only select one ability when using its Relics of the Matriarchs ability, instead of up to two.
At the start of the battle round, select up to two of the abilities in the Relics of the Matriarchs section. Until the start of the next battle round, this model has those abilities.
Each time you gain 1 Miracle dice at the start of the battle round, if this model is on the battlefield, do not roll one D6 to determine the value of that Miracle dice; it has a value of 6.
While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, add 2" to that unit’s Move characteristic and add 1 to Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.
While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, you can re-roll Battle-shock tests taken for that unit.
While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, that unit can perform up to two Acts of Faith per phase, instead of only one.
While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1.
While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.
While a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 6" of this model, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit by 1.
datasheets.Triumph_of_Saint_Katherine.co: 1 Triumph of Saint Katherine – EPIC HERO
datasheets.Triumph_of_Saint_Katherine.fl: At the centre of the Triumph is the blessed bier upon which lie the mortal remains of Saint Katherine beneath the sconce containing her fiery heart. Wherever the Triumph goes, the Emperor’s radiance goes with it. The glory of the martyred Matriarch spreads, and Battle Sisters fill with conviction to purge the foes of Mankind.
datasheets.Triumph_of_Saint_Katherine.le: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD
datasheets.Triumph_of_Saint_Katherine.lo: This model is equipped with: bolt pistols; relic weapons.
datasheets.Seraphim_Squad.abilities.othe: In your Shooting phase, after this unit has shot, if it is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6". If it does, until the end of the turn, this unit is not eligible to declare a charge.
datasheets.Seraphim_Squad.fluff: The Seraphim fight in the Adepta Sororitas advanced guard. Only Battle Sisters with superlative reflexes are selected to join their ranks, firing with pinpoint accuracy while moving at immense speeds. They must be able to land with incredible precision, cut down foes and retreat within a few heartbeats.
datasheets.Seraphim_Squad.loadout: Every model is equipped with: 2 bolt pistols; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Seraphim_Squad.stats.0.name: Seraphim
datasheets.Seraphim_Squad.wargear.0: For every 5 models in the unit, up to 2 Seraphim can each have their 2 bolt pistols replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 2 inferno pistols ◦ 2 Ministorum hand flamers
datasheets.Seraphim_Squad.wargear.1: The Seraphim Superior’s 2 bolt pistols can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 bolt pistol and 1 chainsword ◦ 1 bolt pistol and 1 plasma pistol ◦ 1 bolt pistol and 1 power weapon ◦ 1 plasma pistol and 1 chainsword ◦ 1 plasma pistol and 1 power weapon
datasheets.Repentia_Squad.abilities.othe: While this unit contains a Repentia Superior model, each time a Sisters Repentia model in this unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.
datasheets.Repentia_Squad.fluff: Sisters Repentia charge across the battlefield, filled with the need for atonement for past misdeeds, howling prayers and litanies. Overseen by a stern taskmaster in the form of a Repentia Superior, they exist only to slaughter the enemies of the Emperor, rushing forward without heed for their own safety.
datasheets.Repentia_Squad.loadout:
The Repentia Superior is equipped with: bolt pistol; neural whips.
Each Sister Repentia is equipped with: penitent eviscerator.
datasheets.Repentia_Squad.stats.0.name: Repentia Superior
datasheets.Repentia_Squad.stats.1.name: Sister Repentia
datasheets.Dialogus.abilities.other.0.de: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, you can select one friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. That unit is no longer Battle-shocked.
datasheets.Dialogus.abilities.other.1.de: While this model is leading a unit, each time that unit performs an Act of Faith, the value of one of the Miracle dice used in that Act of Faith is first changed to a 6.
datasheets.Dialogus.fluff: The Dialogus drowns out the war cries of the enemy with shouts of exalting praise to the God-Emperor. She broadcasts her liturgies to her Sisters through their vox-beads and sensor arrays, while her laud hailer amplifies the inspirational rhetoric of prayers and hymns all across the battlefield.
datasheets.Dialogus.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD ■ CELESTIAN SACRESANTS ■ DOMINION SQUAD ■ RETRIBUTOR SQUAD ■ SISTERS NOVITIATE SQUAD This model can be attached to a BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD, even if one CANONESS, PALATINE, JUNITH ERUITA or AESTRED THURGA unit has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.
datasheets.Dialogus.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; Dialogus staff.
datasheets.Dogmata.abilities.other.0.des: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this model, worsen the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit by 1.
datasheets.Dogmata.abilities.other.1.des: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.
datasheets.Dogmata.fluff: With watchful eyes, the Sisters Dogmata seek out infractions in their Order. Feared and respected equally, Dogmatas can condemn a Sister to the Repentia with a single word. With shouted prayers and swings of their maces, they demonstrate the path of righteousness, showing what the Sisters should expect if they fail in their duties.
datasheets.Dogmata.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; mace of the righteous.
datasheets.Immolator.abilities.other.0.d: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, that enemy unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.
datasheets.Immolator.fluff: This Rhino variant has an aggressive machine spirit and an elaborate turret with a powerful weapons system; this makes it ideal for rapid advances to clear enemy strongpoints, providing fire support for the troops it transports to battle and acting as an outrider escort for armoured columns.
datasheets.Immolator.loadout: This model is equipped with: heavy bolter; immolation flamers; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Immolator.transport:
This model has a transport capacity of 6 ADEPTA SORORITAS INFANTRY models. It cannot transport JUMP PACK models or the TRIUMPH OF SAINT KATHERINE.

At the start of the Declare Battle Formations step, you can select one BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD, DOMINION SQUAD or SISTERS NOVITIATE SQUAD from your army. If you do, that unit is split into two units, each containing as equal a number of models as possible (when splitting a unit in this way, make a note of which models form each of the two new units. If you are splitting a unit that has the Cherub ability, only one of the new units can use that ability during the battle – make a note of which of the new units this will be). One of these units must start the battle embarked within this TRANSPORT; the other can start the battle embarked within another TRANSPORT, or it can be deployed as a separate unit.
datasheets.Immolator.wargear.0: This model can be equipped with 1 hunter-killer missile.
datasheets.Immolator.wargear.1: This model’s immolation flamers can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 twin heavy bolter ◦ 1 twin multi-melta
datasheets.Hospitaller.abilities.other.0: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.
datasheets.Hospitaller.abilities.other.1: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return up to 1 destroyed model (excluding CHARACTER models) to that unit. If you wish, you can first discard 1 Miracle dice; if you do, you can return up to D3+1 destroyed models (excluding CHARACTER models) to that unit instead.
datasheets.Hospitaller.fluff: Hospitallers are physical and spiritual healers. They possess medicinal expertise and serve as a font of faith for those in need, whispering mantras of vigour to dull pain and intoning prayers to salve fevered minds. They move swiftly across the battlefield, working solemnly despite the harshest conditions.
datasheets.Hospitaller.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; chirurgeon’s tools.
While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

Each time this model’s unit is selected to shoot or fight, you can discard 1 Miracle dice. If you do, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of Fidelis and the Lance of Illumination. Each time an enemy unit is destroyed by this model, you gain 1 Miracle dice.
datasheets.Morvenn_Vahl.abilities.specia: If this model is in your army, it must be your WARLORD.
datasheets.Morvenn_Vahl.fluff: Aggressive and taciturn, Morvenn Vahl leads the Adepta Sororitas from the front. Taking to the field in an ancient Paragon Warsuit, she smites foe after foe with deafening bursts from Fidelis, devastating salvoes of missiles and pinpoint thrusts with the Lance of Illumination.
datasheets.Morvenn_Vahl.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ PARAGON WARSUITS
datasheets.Morvenn_Vahl.loadout: This model is equipped with: Fidelis; Paragon missile launcher; Lance of Illumination.
datasheets.Retributor_Squad.abilities.ot:
Twice per battle, after this unit has performed an Act of Faith, you gain 1 Miracle dice.

Designer’s Note: Place two Cherub tokens next to the unit, removing one each time this ability has been used.

Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If such an attack targets an enemy unit that has destroyed one or more ADEPTA SORORITAS units from your army during the battle, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.
datasheets.Retributor_Squad.fluff: Retributors are highly experienced warriors and amongst the finest sharpshooters in their Order. Only the most level-headed Battle Sisters join their ranks. Providing long-range fire support is a task that requires excellent target prioritisation skills, as well as the ability to optimise firing solutions and identify enemy weak points.
datasheets.Retributor_Squad.loadout:
The Retributor Superior is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon.
Each Retributor is equipped with: bolt pistol; heavy bolter; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Retributor_Squad.stats.0.name: Retributor

datasheets.Sisters_Novitiate_Squad.abili: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1. If the target of that attack is an enemy unit within range of an objective marker, you can re-roll the Hit roll instead.
You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.
datasheets.Sisters_Novitiate_Squad.fluff: Sisters Novitiate are young recruits to the Adepta Sororitas. Trained by the Drill Abbots of the Schola Progenium, they are assigned to an Order Militant to gain combat experience and prove their mettle in the crucible of war.
datasheets.Sisters_Novitiate_Squad.loado:
The Novitiate Superior is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon.
Each Sister Novitiate is equipped with: autopistol; autogun; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Sisters_Novitiate_Squad.warge: Any number of Sisters Novitiate can each have their autogun and close combat weapon replaced with 1 Novitiate melee weapons.
Up to 2 Sisters Novitiate can each have their autogun replaced with 1 Ministorum flamer.
1 Sister Novitiate’s autogun can be replaced with 1 simulacrum imperialis.
1 Sister Novitiate’s autogun can be replaced with 1 sacred banner.
The Novitiate Superior’s bolt pistol and boltgun can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 bolt pistol and 1 power weapon ◦ 1 plasma pistol and 1 power weapon
datasheets.Daemonifuge.abilities.other.0: At the start of your Shooting phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of and visible to this unit’s Ephrael Stern model. That unit must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 2 from the result if it is a CHAOS unit. If the test is failed, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds.
datasheets.Daemonifuge.abilities.other.1: You can target this unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already targeted a different unit with that Stratagem this phase.
datasheets.Daemonifuge.composition.1: 1 Kyganil of the Bloody Tears – EPIC HERO
datasheets.Daemonifuge.fluff: Ephrael Stern manifests strange powers, which some see as witchery. Yet she is a zealous defender of the Imperial Creed with unwavering devotion. Alongside her Aeldari companion, Kyganil, Stern pits her augmented strength and speed against the Emperor’s enemies.
datasheets.Daemonifuge.loadout:
Ephrael Stern is equipped with: bolt pistol; Sanctity.
Kyganil of the Bloody Tears is equipped with: the Outcast’s Weapons.
datasheets.Daemonifuge.stats.0.name: Ephrael Stern
datasheets.Daemonifuge.stats.1.name: Kyganil of the Bloody Tears
datasheets.Sororitas_Rhino.abilities.oth: At the start of your Command phase, this model regains 1 lost wound.
datasheets.Sororitas_Rhino.fluff: Rhinos are the mainstay transport of the Adepta Sororitas, with Engineers and Ministorum Priests blessing each before battles. They are durable, robust and easy to operate, and thanks to their indomitable machine spirits, they rarely break down. They speed the warriors inside them across the battlefield wherever they are needed.
datasheets.Sororitas_Rhino.loadout: This model is equipped with: storm bolter; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Sororitas_Rhino.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 12 ADEPTA SORORITAS INFANTRY models. It cannot transport JUMP PACK models or the TRIUMPH OF SAINT KATHERINE.
datasheets.Paragon_Warsuits.abilities.ot: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE unit, add 1 to the Hit roll and add 1 to the Wound roll.
datasheets.Paragon_Warsuits.fluff: A pilot must have immense faith for a Paragon Warsuit’s spirit to trust them. They must also have incredible skill to handle its control system, which allows for highly complex and fluid movements. Mastering a Paragon Warsuit makes a Sister capable of engaging the most fearsome enemies and emerging victorious.
datasheets.Paragon_Warsuits.loadout: Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; heavy bolter; Paragon storm bolters; Paragon war blade.
datasheets.Paragon_Warsuits.stats.0.name: Paragon
datasheets.Paragon_Warsuits.wargear.0: Any number of models can each have their Paragon war blade replaced with 1 Paragon war mace.
datasheets.Paragon_Warsuits.wargear.1: Any number of models can each have their heavy bolter replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 Ministorum heavy flamer ◦ 1 multi-melta
datasheets.Paragon_Warsuits.wargear.2: Any number of models can each have their Paragon storm bolters replaced with 1 Paragon grenade launchers.
While this model has 1-4 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

The same enemy unit can only be affected by this ability once per turn.
datasheets.Castigator.fluff: Castigators are powerful battle tanks of the Adepta Sororitas. They provide excellent fire support for Battle Sisters thanks to their varied weapon systems, smashing through the foe’s lines and slaughtering great swathes of enemy infantry in seconds.
datasheets.Castigator.loadout: This model is equipped with: Castigator autocannons; 3 heavy bolters; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Castigator.wargear.0: This model can be equipped with 1 storm bolter.
datasheets.Castigator.wargear.2: This model’s Castigator autocannons can be replaced with 1 Castigator battle cannon.
datasheets.Exorcist.abilities.other.0.de: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, if one or more of those attacks made with an Indirect Fire weapon scored a hit against an enemy unit, that unit must take a Battle-shock test. Each time such an attack destroys an enemy model that has the Deadly Demise ability, that models Deadly Demise ability inflicts mortal wounds on a D6 roll of 5+ instead of on a 6.
datasheets.Exorcist.fluff: Every flurry of notes performed by the Exorcist’s artillerist inloads targeting solutions and impact coordinates so that thrice-blessed rocket volleys bombard the enemy. More than artillery tanks, Exorcists are mobile shrines to the magnificence of the Emperor that project inspirational battle canticles.
datasheets.Exorcist.loadout: This model is equipped with: Exorcist missile launcher; heavy bolter; armoured tracks.
datasheets.Exorcist.wargear.1: This model’s Exorcist missile launcher can be replaced with 1 Exorcist conflagration rockets.
datasheets.Penitent_Engines.abilities.ot: This unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced.
datasheets.Penitent_Engines.fluff: Thanks to the torment amplifiers spliced into their synapses, the pilots of Penitent Engines are in constant and terrible agony. They blaze a trail of destruction with their flamers before charging headlong into the foe, guilt and pain driving them on, heedless of danger. All they leave in their wake is utter carnage.
datasheets.Penitent_Engines.loadout: Every model is equipped with: penitent flamers; twin penitent buzz-blades.
datasheets.Penitent_Engines.wargear.0: Any number of models can each have their twin penitent buzz-blades replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 penitent buzz-blade and 1 penitent flail ◦ 1 twin penitent flails
datasheets.Junith_Eruita.abilities.other: The Pulpit of Saint Holline’s Basilica
While this model is leading a unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

If this model is on the battlefield at the start of your Command phase, you can choose one of the following:

• Discard 1 Miracle dice and gain 1CP.
• Take a Leadership test for this model; if that test is passed, gain 1CP.
datasheets.Junith_Eruita.fluff: Junith Eruita sweeps to war wreathed in holy fire, hovering above the battlefield within the pulpit of Saint Holine’s Basilica. Her presence and voice inspire all around her, filling them with faith, while her heavy flamers douse her foes in purging fire.
datasheets.Junith_Eruita.loadout: This model is equipped with: twin Ministorum heavy flamer; Mace of Castigation.
datasheets.Ministorum_Priest.abilities.o: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

Once per battle, in the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, improve the Attacks and Strength characteristics of melee weapons equipped by this model by 3.
datasheets.Ministorum_Priest.abilities.s: If this model is attached to a DOMINION SQUAD during the Declare Battle Formations step, it gains the Scouts 6" ability. If this model is attached to a SISTERS NOVITIATE SQUAD during the Declare Battle Formations step, it gains the Infiltrators ability.
datasheets.Ministorum_Priest.fluff: It is the role of Ministorum Priests to harness the faith of Imperial warriors in battle. They will often join Wars of Faith - though it is not unheard of for a Ministorum Priest to lead one. Filled with a fearsome religious fervour, they incite the faithful a s they bellow catechisms of hatred.
datasheets.Ministorum_Priest.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ ARCO-FLAGELLANTS ■ BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD ■ DOMINION SQUAD ■ SISTERS NOVITIATE SQUAD
datasheets.Ministorum_Priest.loadout: This model is equipped with: zealot’s vindictor.
datasheets.Ministorum_Priest.wargear.0: This model’s zealot’s vindictor can be replaced with 1 holy pistol and 1 power weapon.
datasheets.Zephyrim_Squad.abilities.othe:
Each time this unit is selected to fight, select one of the following abilities to apply to power weapons equipped by models in this unit until the end of the phase:

■  [SUSTAINED HITS 1]
■  [LETHAL HITS]

Before making your selection, if this unit made a Charge move this turn, you can discard 1 Miracle dice. If you do, until the end of the phase, both of the abilities above apply to power weapons equipped by models in this unit.
datasheets.Zephyrim_Squad.fluff: Only those who experience a direct and persistent connection with the Emperor become Zephyrim. They are divine destroyers, figures of fathomless passion and integrity. On the battlefield, they strike down their foes with ruthless precision while their angelic singing drowns out the screams of the dying.
datasheets.Zephyrim_Squad.loadout: Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; power weapon.
datasheets.Zephyrim_Squad.stats.0.name: Zephyrim
datasheets.Zephyrim_Squad.wargear.0: The Zephyrim Superior’s bolt pistol can be replaced with 1 plasma pistol.
datasheets.Zephyrim_Squad.wargear.1: The Zephyrim Superior can be equipped with 1 sacred banner.
datasheets.Dominion_Squad.abilities.othe: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, If this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to D6".
datasheets.Dominion_Squad.abilities.spec: If this unit has a Leader unit attached to it during the Declare Battle Formations step and this unit starts the battle embarked within a TRANSPORT, that Leader unit gains the Scouts 6" ability.
datasheets.Dominion_Squad.fluff: Dominion Squads strike as swift and furious as lightning, clearing bunkers, capturing strategic locations and blunting counterattacks with vicious salvoes from their flamers and meltaguns. They are aggressive but not impetuous, matching their desire to kill with an awareness of tactical values and bringing righteousness where needed most.
datasheets.Dominion_Squad.loadout: Every model is equipped with: bolt pistol; boltgun; close combat weapon.
datasheets.Dominion_Squad.stats.0.name: Dominion
datasheets.Dominion_Squad.wargear.0: 1 Dominion equipped with 1 boltgun can be equipped with 1 simulacrum imperialis (that model’s boltgun cannot be replaced).
datasheets.Dominion_Squad.wargear.1: Up to 4 Dominions can each have their boltgun replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 artificer-crafted storm bolter ◦ 1 meltagun ◦ 1 Ministorum flamer
datasheets.Dominion_Squad.wargear.2: The Dominion Superior can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 chainsword ◦ 1 power weapon
datasheets.Dominion_Squad.wargear.3: The Dominion Superior’s boltgun can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 bolt pistol ◦ 1 combi-weapon ◦ 1 condemnor boltgun ◦ 1 inferno pistol ◦ 1 Ministorum hand flamer ◦ 1 plasma pistol
datasheets.Saint_Celestine.abilities.oth: While this unit contains a Celestine model, in your Command phase, if this unit is below its Starting Strength, either one destroyed Geminae Superia model or up to D3 other Bodyguard models are returned to this unit.
While this unit contains one or more Geminae Superia models, Celestine has the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

The first time this unit’s Celestine model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set that Celestine model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.
datasheets.Saint_Celestine.fluff: Saint Celestine is a living embodiment of the Emperor’s might, and she radiates holy light. Beneath her, the faithful are filled with courage while heretics experience overwhelming terror. Flanked by her chosen Geminae champions, her gestures can heal the sick or strike like the Emperor’s judgement to smite the foe with divine strength.
datasheets.Saint_Celestine.loadout:
Saint Celestine is equipped with: the Ardent Blade.
Each Geminae Superia is equipped with: bolt pistol; power weapon.
datasheets.Saint_Celestine.stats.0.name: Celestine
datasheets.Saint_Celestine.stats.1.name: Geminae Superia
datasheets.Battle_Sisters_Squad.abilitie: At the end of your Command phase, if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.
datasheets.Battle_Sisters_Squad.fluff: Battle Sisters of the Orders Militant are skilled and devout warriors. Wherever they advance, the light of the Emperor spreads like a holy dawn. Miracles manifest in their presence, turning aside the enemy’s strikes or consuming foes in fires of retribution as the Sisters cut down heretics with thundering salvoes from their boltguns.
1 Battle Sister equipped with 1 boltgun can be equipped with 1 simulacrum imperialis (that model’s boltgun cannot be replaced).

1 Battle Sister’s boltgun can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 artificer-crafted storm bolter ◦ 1 heavy bolter ◦ 1 meltagun ◦ 1 Ministorum flamer ◦ 1 Ministorum heavy flamer ◦ 1 multi-melta
1 Battle Sister’s boltgun can be replaced with one of the following:  ◦ 1 artificer-crafted storm bolter ◦ 1 meltagun ◦ 1 Ministorum flamer
The Sister Superior can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 chainsword ◦ 1 power weapon
The Sister Superior’s boltgun can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 bolt pistol ◦ 1 combi-weapon ◦ 1 condemnor boltgun ◦ 1 inferno pistol ◦ 1 Ministorum hand flamer ◦ 1 plasma pistol
datasheets.Canoness.abilities.other.1.de: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, this model has a 2+ invulnerable save.
Models in the bearer’s unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds and Psychic Attacks.
Each time a model in the bearer’s unit makes an attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.
datasheets.Canoness.fluff: Martial and spiritual commanders of the Orders Militant, Canonesses are as much veteran warriors with decades of experience as they are shining examples of purity. Possessing impeccable leadership skills, tactical prowess and immense faith, Canonesses are beacons of both pious virtue and holy wrath.
datasheets.Canoness.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD ■ CELESTIAN SACRESANTS ■ DOMINION SQUAD ■ RETRIBUTOR SQUAD ■ SISTERS NOVITATE SQUAD
datasheets.Canoness.loadout: This model is equipped with: bolt pistol; hallowed chainsword.
datasheets.Canoness.wargear.0: If this model is equipped with a plasma pistol and a power weapon, it can be equipped with:  ◦ 1 rod of office
datasheets.Canoness.wargear.1: If this model is equipped with a hallowed chainsword, it can be equipped with one of the following:  ◦ 1 brazier of holy fire ◦ 1 null rod
datasheets.Canoness.wargear.2: This model’s hallowed chainsword can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 blessed blade ◦ 1 power weapon
datasheets.Canoness.wargear.3: This model’s bolt pistol can be replaced with one of the following: ◦ 1 condemnor boltgun ◦ 1 inferno pistol ◦ 1 plasma pistol
datasheets.Aestred_Thurga_and_Agathae_Do: While this unit is leading a unit and contains an Aestred Thurga model, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
Recount the Deeds of the Saints

While this unit is leading a unit and contains an Agathe Dolan model, each time that unit destroys an enemy unit, you gain 1 Miracle dice. When that Agathae Dolan model is destroyed, you gain D3 Miracle dice.

Aestred Thurga is a powerful warrior in her own right, but recognises with great humility that the ancient relic standard she carries is far more important than she can ever be. She will gladly die to protect the Auto-Tapestry of the Emperor’s Judgement, while the Sisters she fights alongside are inspired to carry out great deeds of faith in its presence – feats recorded by the Hagiolater, Agathae Dolan.
This unit can be attached to the following units: ■ BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD ■ CELESTIAN SACRESANTS ■ DOMINION SQUAD ■ RETRIBUTOR SQUAD ■ SISTERS NOVITIATE SQUAD

Aestred Thurga is equipped with: bolt pistol; Blade of Vigil.
Agathae Dolan is equipped with: bolt pistol; scribe’s staff.
datasheets.Repressor.abilities.other.0.d: Once per turn, in your opponent’s Charge phase, after an enemy unit has selected targets for its charge but before it makes a Charge move, you can select one Adepta Sororitas unit from your army that was selected as a target of that charge. Provided that unit is not within Engagement Range of any enemy units and every model in that unit is within 3" of this Transport, it can embark within this Transport.
datasheets.Repressor.loadout: This model is equipped with: Repressor twin heavy flamer; storm bolter; dozer ram.
datasheets.Repressor.transport: This model has a transport capacity of 12 Adepta Sororitas Infantry models. It cannot transport Jump Pack models or the Triumph of Saint Katherine.
datasheets.Repressor.wargear.1: This model can be equipped with one of the following: ◦ 1 heavy flamer ◦ 1 storm bolter
datasheets.Battle_Sanctum.abilities.othe: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fortification, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

When this Fortification is set up, all parts of it must be set up within 1" of another part. Friendly Adepta Sororitas Infantry models can be set up or end any type of move on top of the floor sections of this Fortification. While an Adepta Sororitas unit from your army is within 1" of this Fortification, that unit can perform up to two Acts of Faith per phase, instead of just one.
datasheets.Battle_Sanctum.abilities.prim: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more Fortifications from your army: ■  That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. ■  Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle- shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.
datasheets.Battle_Sanctum.loadout: This model is equipped with: nothing.
detachments.Bringers_of_Flame.name: Bringers of Flame
detachments.Bringers_of_Flame.enhancemen: ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. Each time the bearer is selected to fight, you can first discard up to 3 Miracle dice. For each Miracle dice just discarded, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons.

ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. At the start of your Command phase, you can discard up to 2 Miracle dice. Then, add 1 Miracle dice to your Miracle Dice pool showing a value equal to the sum of the two Miracle dice you just discarded (to a maximum of 6).

ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of Torrent weapons equipped by models in that unit, and all other ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.
CANONESS or PALATINE model only. The bearer has a Save characteristic of 2+ and the Feel No Pain 5+ ability.
detachments.Bringers_of_Flame.rules.0.ru: Ranged weapons equipped by **ADEPTA SORORITAS** models from your army have the **[ASSAULT]** ability, and each time an attack made with such a weapon targets a unit within 6", add 1 to the Strength characteristic of that attack.
detachments.Bringers_of_Flame.stratagems: Shield of Aversion
One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Your opponent’s Shooting phase or the Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.
Until the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, each time an attack targets your unit, worsen the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1.
The Sisters of Battle gird themselves with the strength of their faith. It is a shield of repulsion that rejects the heretical cunning of their enemies.
Righteous Blows
One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Fight phase.

Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of attacks made by those weapons this phase, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.
As the faithful strike their foes in righteous anger, they feel the Emperor’s hand adding strength to their blows.
Rites of Fire
One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that disembarked from a TRANSPORT this turn and has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Your Shooting phase.

Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a ranged attack that targets an enemy unit within 6" that is also within range of an objective marker, add 1 to the Wound roll. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of those attacks, select one of those destroyed models; that destroyed model’s unit must take a Battle-shock test.
At close range, the Adepta Sororitas unleash the full devastating potential of their blessed weapons.
Cleansing Flames
One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot this phase.
Until the end of the phase, Torrent weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
Burn the mutant. Burn the heretic. Burn the witch.
Blazing Ire
One ADEPTA SORORITAS TRANSPORT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Your opponent’s Shooting phase, just after an enemy unit has shot.

One unit embarked within your TRANSPORT can disembark as if it were your Movement phase, and can then shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.
The transports of the Adepta Sororitas are mobile shrines. The Sisters within this vehicle recite psalms of righteous hatred and destruction before emerging to obliterate their foes.
Carry Forth the Faithful
That ADEPTA SORORITAS TRANSPORT model.
Your Movement phase, just before an ADEPTA SORORITAS TRANSPORT model from your army Advances.

Until the end of the turn, you can re-roll Advance rolls made for your TRANSPORT, and units can disembark from your TRANSPORT even though it Advanced. Units that do so count as having made a Normal move, and cannot declare a charge this turn.
Congregated within a transport, the Battle Sisters recite bellowing prayers so that the whole vehicle echoes to furious piety.
detachments.Army_of_Faith.name: Army of Faith
detachments.Army_of_Faith.enhancements.S: CANONESS or PALATINE model only. At the start of your Command phase, if the bearer is on the battlefield, take a Leadership test for the bearer. If that test is passed, you gain 1 Miracle dice.
detachments.Army_of_Faith.enhancements.T: ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. Improve the Strength and Armour Penetration characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons by 1, and those weapons have the [PRECISION] ability. In addition, each time the bearer fights, if one or more enemy models are destroyed by those attacks, you gain 1 Miracle dice.
detachments.Army_of_Faith.enhancements.C: ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. In your Movement phase, you can select one enemy unit within 12" of the bearer; that unit must take a Battle-shock test. If that test is failed, you gain 1 Miracle dice.
detachments.Army_of_Faith.enhancements.M: ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. Each time the bearer uses an Act of Faith to substitute a saving throw, that saving throw is successful, irrespective of the value of the Miracle dice used.
detachments.Army_of_Faith.rules.0.name: Sacred Rites
detachments.Army_of_Faith.rules.0.rule.0: Each **ADEPTA SORORITAS** unit from your army can perform up to two Acts of Faith per phase, instead of just one.
detachments.Army_of_Faith.stratagems.Pas: That ADEPTA SORORITAS unit, or one friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit within 3" of it.
Any phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army suffers a mortal wound.

Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds. If you targeted an ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit from your army with this Stratagem, then until the end of the phase, while a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is unit is within 3" of your unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds.
There is no armour as resilient as conviction itself.
detachments.Army_of_Faith.stratagems.Las: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army.

Until the end of the turn, your unit is blessed. While a unit is blessed, it can ignore any or all modifiers to the following: the profile characteristics of its models; the Weapon Skill or Ballistic Skill characteristics of weapons equipped by its models; any roll or test made for it (excluding modifiers to saving throws). If your unit has the JUMP PACK keyword, until the end of the turn, while a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is within 3" of your unit, that friendly unit is also blessed.
The Emperor’s radiance shines upon his warriors, magnifying their purity in their darkest hour.
detachments.Army_of_Faith.stratagems.Pur: Until the end of the phase, melee weapons equipped by models in your unit have the [LANCE] ability. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of your unit’s attacks this phase, you gain 1 Miracle dice.
The righteous zeal of the Sisters of Battle burns bright as they charge towards their foes.
detachments.Army_of_Faith.stratagems.Rig: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Your Shooting phase or the Fight phase.

Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes an attack, improve the Armour Penetration characteristic of that attack by 1. If one or more enemy models are destroyed as the result of any of those attacks, you gain 1 Miracle dice.
With miraculous precision, the blows of the Sisters of Battle strike the weak points of enemy armour.
detachments.Army_of_Faith.stratagems.Shi: One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks, or one friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit within 3" of such a unit.

Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. If you targeted an ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit from your army with this Stratagem, then until the end of the phase, while a friendly ADEPTA SORORITAS unit is unit is within 3" of your unit, each time an attack targets that unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.
The Emperor’s divinity manifests in golden halos, blinding the enemy with radiant light.
detachments.Army_of_Faith.stratagems.Rig: One ADEPTA SORORITAS JUMP PACK unit from your army.
End of your opponent’s Fight phase.
Remove your unit from the battlefield and place to into Strategic Reserves.
You cannot select a unit that is within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units.
On wings of fire do the angelic warriors of the Orders Militant descent to battle.
detachments.Hallowed_Martyrs.name: Hallowed Martyrs
detachments.Hallowed_Martyrs.enhancement: ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. When the bearer is destroyed, you gain an additional D3 Miracle dice.

ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. Add 1 to the Attacks, Strength and Damage characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons. If the bearer has lost one or more wounds, add 2 to the Attacks, Strength and Damage characteristics of the bearer’s melee weapons instead.

ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. At the end of your Command phase, if the bearer is on the battlefield, you can re-roll 1 Miracle dice from your Miracle dice pool and return it to your Miracle dice pool showing the new result you rolled. When doing so, if the bearer’s unit is below its Starting Strength, you can re-roll up to 3 Miracle dice in this way instead.
CANONESS or PALATINE model only. Each time an attack is allocated to the bearer, change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 1.
detachments.Hallowed_Martyrs.rules.0.rul: Each time an **ADEPTA SORORITAS** model from your army makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll if that model’s unit is below its Starting Strength, and add 1 to the Wound roll as well if that model’s unit is Below Half-strength.
Righteous Vengeance
Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit makes a melee attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll and, if your unit is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll as well.
With the Emperor’s light upon them, the righteous vengeance of the Sisters of Battle burns brighter.
Divine Intervention
One ADEPTA SORORITAS CHARACTER unit from your army that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
Any phase.

You can discard 1‐3 Miracle dice. At the end of the phase, set the last destroyed model from your unit back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy models. Roll one D3, adding 1 to the result for each Miracle dice you discarded. That model is set back up with that number of wounds remaining (up to its starting number of wounds).
You cannot select SAINT CELESTINE as the target of this Stratagem. You cannot select the same CHARACTER as the target of this Stratagem more than once per battle.
The pious believe that, in their moment of greatest need, the Emperor protects.
Suffering and Sacrifice
One ADEPTA SORORITAS INFANTRY or ADEPTA SORORITAS WALKER unit from your army.
Start of the Fight phase.
Until the end of the phase, each time an enemy model within Engagement Range of your unit selects its targets, it must select your unit as the target of its attacks.
Suffering is a staple for the Adepta Sororitas, and a martyr’s fate only brings glory to the God-Emperor.
Sanctified Immolation
One ADEPTA SORORITAS VEHICLE model from your army with the Deadly Demise ability that was just destroyed. You can use this Stratagem on that model even though it was just destroyed.
Do not roll one D6 to determine whether mortal wounds are inflicted by your model’s Deadly Demise ability. Instead, mortal wounds are automatically inflicted.
The enemy must perish, even if we perish with them. The enemy must burn, even if we burn with them.
Praise the Fallen
One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that had one or more of its models destroyed as a result of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Your unit can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but it must target only that enemy unit when doing so, and can only do so if that enemy unit is an eligible target.
The death of a Battle Sister only stirs the survivors to fight harder to exact swift vengeance.
Spirit of the Martyr
Fight phase, just after an enemy unit has selected its targets.

Until the end of the phase, each time a model in your unit is destroyed, if that model has not fought this phase, do not remove it from play. The destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
Even with their dying act, the Adepta Sororitas mete out the Emperor’s judgement.
detachments.Penitent_Host.name: Penitent Host
detachments.Penitent_Host.enhancements.S: ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. While the bearer is on the battlefield, each time an enemy unit is destroyed by a PENITENT unit from your army, you can discard 1 Miracle dice then gain 1 Miracle dice showing a value of 6.
detachments.Penitent_Host.enhancements.T: PENITENT model only. Once per battle, at the start of the battle round, select one Vow of Atonement (see the Desperate for Redemption detachment rule). Until the start of the next battle round, that Vow of Atonement is active for the bearer’s unit in addition to any that is active for your army, even if you have already selected that Vow of Atonement this battle.
detachments.Penitent_Host.enhancements.C: PENITENT model only. While the bearer is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 5+ invulnerable save.
detachments.Penitent_Host.enhancements.M: CANONESS, PALATINE or MINISTORUM PRIEST model only. The bearer gains the PENITENT keyword and, during the Declare Battle Formations step, can be attached to a REPENTIA SQUAD unit.
detachments.Penitent_Host.rules.0.name: Desperate For Redemption
detachments.Penitent_Host.rules.0.rule.0: At the start of the battle round, you can select one of the following Vows of Atonement to be active for your army until the start of the next battle round. You can only select each Vow of Atonement once per battle.
detachments.Penitent_Host.rules.0.rule.2: Add 3" to the Move characteristic of **PENITENT** models from your army.
detachments.Penitent_Host.rules.0.rule.4: Each time a unit from your army is selected to fight, if that unit made a Charge move this turn, until the end of the phase, add 1 to the Attacks and Strength characteristics of melee weapons equipped by **PENITENT** models in that unit.
detachments.Penitent_Host.rules.0.rule.6: Each time a **PENITENT** model from your army is destroyed by a melee attack, if that model has not fought this phase, roll one D6. On a 2+, do not remove it from play; the destroyed model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
detachments.Penitent_Host.stratagems.Pas: One PENITENT unit from your army that has not been selected to fight this phase.
Until the end of the phase, each time a PENITENT model in your unit makes a melee attack, a successful unmodified Hit roll of 5+ scores a Critical Hit.
The penitent are full of a burning passion to inflict suffering upon the faithless.
detachments.Penitent_Host.stratagems.Las: Your Movement phase, just before a PENITENT unit from your army Advances.

Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced. If your unit has the PENITENT ENGINES keyword, do not make an Advance roll for it; instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in your unit.
Agony and guilt drive these sinners forward. Only by meeting the enemy in combat may they find repentance or, failing that, the comfort of death.
detachments.Penitent_Host.stratagems.Pur: One PENITENT unit from your army that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.
Until the end of the phase, PENITENT models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability.

Suffering is the penance by which the faithful affirm their devotions. To share in the agonies suffered by the God-Emperor and his saints without embracing death is the mark of fidelity to the Imperial Creed.
detachments.Penitent_Host.stratagems.Rig: One PENITENT unit from your army that was just destroyed while it was within range of an objective marker you controlled. You can use this Stratagem on that unit even though it was just destroyed.
That objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.
Those seeking absolution in the eyes of the Emperor will gladly give their last drop of blood to defy his enemies.
detachments.Penitent_Host.stratagems.Shi: Your Movement phase, just after an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army Falls Back.

Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot or declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back. If your unit has the PENITENT keyword, it is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back instead.
The urge to absolve their sins and destroy the enemy drives the penitents to push their tortured bodies beyond their mortal limits.
detachments.Penitent_Host.stratagems.Rig: One PENITENT unit from your army that was selected as the target as one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.

detachments.Champions_of_Faith.name: Champions of Faith
detachments.Champions_of_Faith.enhanceme: ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. Each time a model in the bearer’s unit makes an attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to that attack’s Ballistic Skill or Weapon Skill characteristics and/or any or all modifiers to the Hit roll.

ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the bearer’s melee weapons. While the bearer’s unit is Righteous, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic and add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the bearer’s melee weapons instead.
ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. The bearer’s weapons have the [PRECISION] ability. Each time the bearer’s unit destroys an enemy CHARACTER model, you gain 1CP.
ADEPTA SORORITAS model only. Enemy units that are set up on the battlefield from Reserves cannot be set up within 12" of the bearer.
detachments.Champions_of_Faith.rules.0.r:
In your Command phase, you can discard up to 3 of your Miracle dice. For each discarded, you can select one **ADEPTA SORORITAS** unit from your army. Until the start of your next Command phase, that unit is Righteous. While a unit is Righteous:

■ Add 1" to the Move characteristic of models in that unit.
■ Improve the Leadership characteristic of models in that unit by 1.
■ Improve the Weapon Skill and Ballistic Skill characteristics of weapons equipped by **BATTLE SISTERS SQUAD**, **CELESTIAN SACRESANTS** and **PARAGON WARSUITS** models in that unit by 1.
detachments.Champions_of_Faith.stratagem: Shield of Denial
Any phase, just after a mortal wound is allocated to an ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army.

Until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability against mortal wounds. If your unit is Righteous, until the end of the phase, models in your unit have the Feel No Pain 5+ ability against mortal wounds instead.
With so singular and fanatical a purpose, the Adepta Sororitas can will their injuries away, at least until the fight is done.
To The Heart Of Heresy

Seizing their moment to drive like a burning blade through the enemy lines and complete their holy mission, these faithful strike with unstoppable might.&x20;
Path of the Righteous

Until the end of the turn, each time a model in your unit makes a Pile‑in or Consolidation move, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3". When doing so, if your unit is Righteous, it does not need to end that move closer to the closest enemy model, provided it ends that move as close as possible to the closest enemy unit.
When exemplars of the Imperial Creed stride to do the God‑Emperor’s will, little can slow their sacred procession.
Bastion of Faith
One CELESTIAN SACRESANTS unit that was selected as the target of one or more of the attacking unit’s attacks.

Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets your unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. In addition, if your unit is Righteous, you can select one other CELESTIAN SACRESANTS unit from your army that is not Battle‑shocked and is within 6" of your unit. Until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets that CELESTIAN SACRESANTS unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll as well.

Suffer Not The Unfaithful
One ADEPTA SORORITAS unit from your army that is Righteous and that has not been selected to shoot or fight this phase.
Select either the [LETHAL HITS] or [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability. Until the end of the phase, weapons equipped by models in your unit have the selected ability.

Indefatigable Dedication

Until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back. If your unit is Righteous, until the end of the turn, your unit is eligible to shoot and declare a charge in a turn in which it Fell Back instead.
Such champions of the God‑Emperor never stop fighting or striving for victory, transforming momentary retreats into another opportunity to purge the unclean and press on to their objective.
rules.army.Acts_of_Faith.rule.0.text: If your Army Faction is **ADEPTA SORORITAS**, each unit from your army with this ability can perform one Act of Faith per phase. This is done using Miracle dice.
rules.army.Acts_of_Faith.rule.2.text:
If your Army Faction is **ADEPTA SORORITAS**, you gain 1 Miracle dice:

■ At the start of each battle round.
■ Each time an **ADEPTA SORORITAS** unit from your army is destroyed.

Each time you gain a Miracle dice, roll one D6. The number you roll is the value of that Miracle dice. This value cannot be changed or re‐rolled, unless a rule specifically states otherwise. Keep your Miracle dice to one side – this is your Miracle dice pool.
rules.army.Acts_of_Faith.rule.4.text:
Before making a dice roll for a model or unit from your army with the Acts of Faith ability, if you have one or more dice in your Miracle dice pool, that unit can perform an Act of Faith. If it does, select one of the dice from your Miracle dice pool to substitute that dice roll (if a roll involves more than one dice, e.g. a Charge roll or Battle-shock test, only a single dice can be substituted). The dice that is being substituted is not rolled; instead, the value of the selected Miracle dice is used as if it had been rolled (this counts as an unmodified dice roll of that value for all rules purposes). Each Miracle dice can only be selected for substitution once. Once all Miracle dice substitutions have been made, remove the chosen Miracle dice from your Miracle dice pool, and roll all remaining, unsubstituted dice that are apart of the dice roll. You can use Miracle dice when a unit performs an Act of Faith for any of the following types of dice roll:

■ Advance roll
■ Battle-shock test
■ Charge roll
■ Damage roll
■ Hit roll
■ Saving throw
■ Wound roll
rules.army.Acts_of_Faith.rule.5.text: ***Example:** Instead of rolling 2D6 to take a Battle-shock test for a unit, you could use one dice from your Miracle dice pool. If the value of that dice was 4, the unit’s Battle-shock test would be determined by rolling one D6 and adding 4 to it (i.e. it would be D6+4).*
